Module com.example.demo
Package com.example.demo.Object.Object

Class AmmoBox

java.lang.Object
javafx.scene.Node
javafx.scene.image.ImageView
com.example.demo.Actor.ActiveActor
com.example.demo.Actor.ActiveActorDestructible
com.example.demo.Object.Object.AmmoBox
All Implemented Interfaces:
Destructible, javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget
public class AmmoBox extends ActiveActorDestructible
The AmmoBox class represents an ammo box object in the game. It extends ActiveActorDestructible and moves horizontally across the screen. The ammo box can be collected by the player to replenish ammo or provide power-ups.

The ammo box moves with a constant horizontal velocity, and its appearance in the game is based on a spawn probability.

  • Field Details

    • IMAGE_NAME

      private static final String IMAGE_NAME
      The name of the image file for the ammo box. This constant is used to load the image of the ammo box during initialization.
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • IMAGE_WIDTH

      private static final int IMAGE_WIDTH
      The width of the ammo box image. This constant defines the width of the ammo box when it is displayed on the screen.
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • IMAGE_HEIGHT

      private static final int IMAGE_HEIGHT
      The height of the ammo box image. This constant defines the height of the ammo box when it is displayed on the screen.
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • HORIZONTAL_VELOCITY

      private static final int HORIZONTAL_VELOCITY
      The horizontal velocity of the ammo box. This constant defines how fast the ammo box moves horizontally across the screen.
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • SPAWN_PROBABILITY

      private static final double SPAWN_PROBABILITY
      The probability of the ammo box spawning in the game. This constant determines the chance that an ammo box will appear during gameplay.
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • MaximumXPosition

      private static final double MaximumXPosition
      The maximum X position for the ammo box in the game. This constant defines the furthest horizontal position the ammo box can reach before disappearing.
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • MaximumYPosition

      private static final double MaximumYPosition
      The maximum Y position for the ammo box in the game. This constant defines the maximum vertical position the ammo box can reach.
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

  • Constructor Details

    • AmmoBox

      public AmmoBox(double initialXPos, double initialYPos)
      Constructs a new AmmoBox object with the specified initial position.

      The ammo box is initialized with an image, width, height, and the given initial position. It is displayed on the screen at the specified starting position.

      Parameters:
      initialXPos - The initial X position of the ammo box.
      initialYPos - The initial Y position of the ammo box.

  • Method Details

    • moveHorizontally

      protected void moveHorizontally(double horizontalMove)
      Moves the ammo box horizontally by the specified amount.

      This method updates the horizontal position of the ammo box, moving it to the left across the screen.

      Overrides:
      moveHorizontally in class ActiveActor
      Parameters:
      horizontalMove - The distance to move the ammo box horizontally.

    • updatePosition

      public void updatePosition()
      Updates the position of the ammo box by moving it horizontally.

      This method is called in each game frame to update the ammo box's horizontal position on the screen.

      Specified by:
      updatePosition in class ActiveActorDestructible

    • updateActor

      public void updateActor()
      Updates the state of the ammo box, including its position and hitbox.

      This method calls updatePosition() to move the ammo box and updateHitbox() to update the ammo box's collision detection area.

      Specified by:
      updateActor in class ActiveActorDestructible

    • takeDamage

      public void takeDamage()
      Handles the behavior when the ammo box takes damage.

      In this implementation, the ammo box does not take damage, so this method does nothing.

      Specified by:
      takeDamage in interface Destructible
      Specified by:
      takeDamage in class ActiveActorDestructible

    • getSpawnProbability

      public static double getSpawnProbability()
      Returns the probability of the ammo box spawning in the game.

      This method provides the chance that an ammo box will appear in the game during gameplay.

      Returns:
      The spawn probability of the ammo box.

    • getMaximumXPosition

      public static double getMaximumXPosition()
      Returns the maximum X position for the ammo box in the game.

      This method provides the maximum horizontal position the ammo box can reach within the game area.

      Returns:
      The maximum X position of the ammo box.

    • getMaximumYPosition

      public static double getMaximumYPosition()
      Returns the maximum Y position for the ammo box in the game.

      This method provides the maximum vertical position the ammo box can reach within the game area.

      Returns:
      The maximum Y position of the ammo box.
